thread.title: RBI sets rupee reference rate at 63.6506 vs dollar
thread.title_full: RBI sets rupee reference rate at 63.6506 vs dollar | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: RBI sets rupee reference rate at 63.6506 vs dollar
text:
The Reserve Bank of India on Tuesday fixed the reference rate of rupee at 63.6506 against the US dollar and 68.9081 for the euro as against 63.5510 and 68.8321 respectively on Monday.
According to an RBI statement, the exchange rates for the pound and the yen against the rupee were Quote: d at 99.1358 and 51.17 per 100 yen, respectively, based on reference rates for the dollar and cross-currency Quote: s at noon.
The SDR-rupee rate will be based on this rate, the statement added.
 21, 2015 4:22 pm
